question: During science class, students combined 1 kg of iron filings with 1 kg of sand to create a mixture. Which of the following methods would be best for separating the iron filings from the sand?
candidate_answers: (A) Stir the mixture into hot water to dissolve the sand. (B) Strain the mixture through a paper filter to collect the sand. (C) Drag a magnet through the mixture to attract the iron filings. (D) Shake the mixture to cause the iron filings to settle to the bottom.
answer: Drag a magnet through the mixture to attract the iron filings.
label: C
